ya2.1.2:2.1_0: Piyarūpaṁ sātarūpaṁ rūpaṁ, na rūpakkhandho. Rūpakkhandho rūpañceva rūpakkhandho ca.
ya2.1.2:7.1_0: Diṭṭhisaññā saññā, na saññākkhandho. Saññākkhandho saññā ceva saññākkhandho ca.
ya2.1.2:10.1_0: Saṅkhārakkhandhaṁ ṭhapetvā avasesā saṅkhārā, na saṅkhārakkhandho.
ya2.1.2:16.1_1: Rūpañca rūpakkhandhañca ṭhapetvā avasesā na ceva rūpaṁ na ca rūpakkhandho.
ya2.1.2:21.1_1: Saññañca saññākkhandhañca ṭhapetvā avasesā na ceva saññā na ca saññākkhandho.
ya2.1.2:24.1_0: Saṅkhārakkhandhaṁ ṭhapetvā avasesā na saṅkhārakkhandho, saṅkhārā.
ya2.1.2:24.1_1: Saṅkhāre ca saṅkhārakkhandhañca ṭhapetvā avasesā na ceva saṅkhārā na ca saṅkhārakkhandho.
